text: Ek din Sāūl ne Dāūd se bāt kī, “Maiṅ apnī baṛī beṭī Mīrab kā rishtā āp ke sāth bāndhnā chāhtā hūṅ. Lekin pahle sābit kareṅ ki āp achchhe faujī haiṅ, jo Rab kī jangoṅ meṅ ḳhūb hissā le.” Lekin dil hī dil meṅ Sāūl ne sochā, “Ḳhud to maiṅ Dāūd par hāth nahīṅ uṭhāūṅgā, behtar hai ki wuh Filistiyoṅ ke hāthoṅ mārā jāe.”
